item.title: Powerful Python
item.description: Python is a tool that is similar and as useful as R Studio. Python can be used as a calculator, can manipulate strings, can create lists, and can be used as many other functions. Additionally, Python can create plots. Below are some examples: # python as a calculator 3-2 ## 1 3+2 ## 5 3**2 ## 9 # indexing and lists list1=[1,2,3,4] list2=['a','b','c','d'] list1[0] ## 1 list2[1] ## 'b' list2[2:] ## ['c', 'd'] # reticulate library(reticulate) hi<-"Hello" hi="world" print(r.
